original: @80a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @80a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

original: skar ma rgyu ba rnams kyi las sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: skar ma rgyu ba rnams kyi las sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: A practitioner who is bound by the commitments and who wishes to accomplish the various activities of the moving stars should

original: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas /
translated: first perform the yoga of glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

original: zhi ba'i las byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: zhi ba'i las byed par 'dod pas /
translated: If one wishes to perform the activity of pacifying,

original: me bzhi la bya'o //
analyzed: me bzhi la bya'o //
translated: one should do it on the fourth.

original: rgyas pa'i las la rgyal /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i las la rgyal /
translated: For the activity of increasing, on the eighth.

original: dbang gi las la khrums smad la /
analyzed: dbang gi las la khrums smad la /
translated: For the activity of controlling, on the last of the winter months.

original: dral shul sna tshogs kyi las byed par 'dod pas nag pa la bya'o //
analyzed: dral shul sna tshogs kyi las byed par 'dod pas nag pa la bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to perform the activity of various separations, one should do it on the new moon.

original: bskrad par 'dod pas lag la /🔽dbye bar 'dod pas sa ri la /🔽bkar bar 'dod pas gro bzhin la /
analyzed: bskrad par 'dod pas lag la / dbye bar 'dod pas sa ri la / bkar bar 'dod pas gro bzhin la /
translated: If one wishes to expel, on the left.🔽If one wishes to separate, on the Śravaṇa.🔽If one wishes to paralyze, on the Aśvinī.

original: rmugs bar 'dod bas mon gre la /🔽rengs par 'dod pas nab so la //🔽skrag par 'dod pas smin drug la /
analyzed: rmugs bar 'dod bas mon gre la / rengs par 'dod pas nab so la // skrag par 'dod pas smin drug la /
translated: If one wishes to stupefy, on the Bharaṇī.🔽If one wishes to frighten, on the Aśleṣā.🔽If one wishes to summon, on the Bhadrapadā.

original: 'gugs par 'dod pas byi bzhin la /🔽'jil bar 'dod pas snar ma la /
analyzed: 'gugs par 'dod pas byi bzhin la / 'jil bar 'dod pas snar ma la /
translated: If one wishes to destroy, on the Aśvinī.

original: 'khrug par 'dod pas bra nye la /
analyzed: 'khrug par 'dod pas bra nye la /
translated: If one wishes to agitate, on the Bharaṇī.

original: rgyal bar 'dod pas lha mtshams la ;
analyzed: rgyal bar 'dod pas lha mtshams la ;
translated: One who wishes to be victorious should do it on the eleventh day of the bright fortnight.

original: / dpung dang ldan par 'dod pas mgo la /🔽sa'i las byed par 'dod pas khrums stod la /
analyzed: / dpung dang ldan par 'dod pas mgo la / sa'i las byed par 'dod pas khrums stod la /
translated: One who wishes to have an army should do it on the head lunar mansion.🔽One who wishes to do earth rites should do it on the Mṛgaśirā lunar mansion.

original: chu'i las byed par 'dod pas chu stod la /🔽me'i las byed par 'dod pas nam gru la /
analyzed: chu'i las byed par 'dod pas chu stod la / me'i las byed par 'dod pas nam gru la /
translated: One who wishes to do water rites should do it on the Ārdrā lunar mansion.🔽One who wishes to do fire rites should do it on the Punarvasu lunar mansion.

original: rlung gi las byed par 'dod pas mchu la /🔽sa'i sde pham par 'dod na khrums smad la /
analyzed: rlung gi las byed par 'dod pas mchu la / sa'i sde pham par 'dod na khrums smad la /
translated: One who wishes to do wind rites should do it on the Aśvinī lunar mansion.🔽If one wishes to defeat the earth class, one should do it on the Uttarāṣāḍha lunar mansion.

original: chu'i sde pham par 'dod na chu smad la /🔽me'i sde pham par 'dod na dbo la /
analyzed: chu'i sde pham par 'dod na chu smad la / me'i sde pham par 'dod na dbo la /
translated: If one wishes to defeat the water class, one should do it on the Uttarā lunar mansion.🔽If one wishes to defeat the fire class, one should do it on the Śravaṇa lunar mansion.

original: rlung gi sde pham par 'dod nas ga la /
analyzed: rlung gi sde pham par 'dod nas ga la /
translated: If one wishes to defeat the wind class, one should do it on the Bharaṇī lunar mansion.

original: ma grub pa grub par 'dod na mon gru la /🔽grub ba chud mi za bar byed pa tha skar la /🔽'dod pa'i don rab tu sbyin par 'dod pas brel bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa grub par 'dod na mon gru la / grub ba chud mi za bar byed pa tha skar la / 'dod pa'i don rab tu sbyin par 'dod pas brel bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to accomplish what has not been accomplished, one should do it on the Mūla lunar mansion.🔽If one wishes to prevent the loss of what has been accomplished, one should do it on the Āśleṣā lunar mansion.🔽If one wishes to be granted one’s desired aim, one should do it on the Maghā lunar mansion.

original: bsgrub bya phung bar byed par 'dod pas skag la /🔽nor @80b bsgrub par 'dod pas snon la bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya phung bar byed par 'dod pas skag la / nor @80b bsgrub par 'dod pas snon la bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to destroy the object of practice, one should do it on the Śatabhiṣā lunar mansion.🔽If one wishes to accomplish wealth, one should do it on the Revatī lunar mansion.

original: gzhan 'jig rten ba'i legs pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pas rgyal la bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'jig rten ba'i legs pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pas rgyal la bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to accomplish various mundane benefits, one should do it on the Puṣya lunar mansion.

original: pha rol la nyams pa sna tshogs gtong bar 'dod pas bra nye la bya'o //🔽de ltar dmag drang bar 'dod ba dang / nor rnyed par 'dod pa dang / tshong rgyal bar 'dod pas snubs la bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol la nyams pa sna tshogs gtong bar 'dod pas bra nye la bya'o // de ltar dmag drang bar 'dod ba dang / nor rnyed par 'dod pa dang / tshong rgyal bar 'dod pas snubs la bya'o //
translated: If you wish to inflict various kinds of harm on your enemies, do it on Bṛhaspati.🔽If you wish to lead an army, to acquire wealth, or to win in business, do it on Śravaṇa.

original: rtsa ra dang rkun ma'i las grub par 'dod pas tha skar la bya'o //
analyzed: rtsa ra dang rkun ma'i las grub par 'dod pas tha skar la bya'o //
translated: If you wish to accomplish the work of thieves and robbers, do it on Aśvinī.

original: 'jigs pa brgyad las thar bar 'dod na mon gru la bya'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad las thar bar 'dod na mon gru la bya'o //
translated: If you wish to be free from the eight fears, do it on Mṛgaśiras.

original: bgegs bzlog pa dang mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung bzlog par 'dod pas lha mtshams la bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs bzlog pa dang mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung bzlog par 'dod pas lha mtshams la bya'o //
translated: If you wish to avert obstacles, to become invisible, or to repel the armies of others, do it on Punarvasu.

original: skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / dpal dbang phyug dang / rgyal sar 'don pa dang / tshong bzang bar 'dod pas rgyal la /
analyzed: skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / dpal dbang phyug dang / rgyal sar 'don pa dang / tshong bzang bar 'dod pas rgyal la /
translated: If you wish to wash your hair, to bathe, to have glorious power, to be enthroned, or to have good business, do it on Puṣya.

original: bag ma gtong ba dang / skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / gos dang sa bon 'debs par 'dod pas lag la /
analyzed: bag ma gtong ba dang / skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / gos dang sa bon 'debs par 'dod pas lag la /
translated: If you wish to give away a bride, to wash your hair, to bathe, to wear clothes, or to plant seeds, do it on Hasta.

original: ston mo dang 'du pa sbud pa dang / 'dun ma dang / gros legs par 'dod pas nab so la bya'o //
analyzed: ston mo dang 'du pa sbud pa dang / 'dun ma dang / gros legs par 'dod pas nab so la bya'o //
translated: The festival, the gathering, the blowing, the council, and the good counsel are to be performed under the nakṣatra Ārdrā.

original: gzhan gnyen sbyor dang / mkhar len dang nyo ba dang / 'khor ba'i las gang yang grub par 'dod pas me bzhi la bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gnyen sbyor dang / mkhar len dang nyo ba dang / 'khor ba'i las gang yang grub par 'dod pas me bzhi la bya'o //
translated: The marriage, the building of a house, the purchase, and any other activity that one wishes to accomplish are to be performed under the nakṣatra Āśleṣā.

original: de ltar na nye ba ston pa'i las sna tshogs la yang mkhas par spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na nye ba ston pa'i las sna tshogs la yang mkhas par spyad par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should engage in the various activities of the teacher with skill.

original: de ltar rgyu skar rnams dus nges pa las ma 'khrul bar byas na /
analyzed: de ltar rgyu skar rnams dus nges pa las ma 'khrul bar byas na /
translated: In this way, having made the nakṣatras unerring with respect to the determined time,

original: gdon mi za bar 'grub pa la the tshom med do //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'grub pa la the tshom med do //
translated: one will certainly accomplish without doubt.

original: de'i phyir na rgyu skar rnams ni bzang po yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na rgyu skar rnams ni bzang po yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the nakṣatras are said to be auspicious.

original: de nas so so'i phyogs kyi gza' rnams dang btub par nges par 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas so so'i phyogs kyi gza' rnams dang btub par nges par 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Then, the planets are to be ascertained as being compatible with each other.

original: de ltar rgyu skar 'di dag gis ni legs pa dang nyes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs ston pas gtso che'o //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu skar 'di dag gis ni legs pa dang nyes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs ston pas gtso che'o //
translated: In this way, these nakṣatras are the most important because they reveal the good and bad, and the various machines of the world.

original: rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa /
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa /
translated: The various activities of the constellations,

original: dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba /
translated: called the “good time-keeper,”

original: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is completed.
